definition: A term used to describe the act of visually perceiving the surrounding environment from a higher vantage point, often associated with a sense of anticipation or contemplation. It is commonly used to refer to the view or panorama observed from a lookout point, such as a hilltop, tower, or scenic spot.

examples.german: Der Ausblick von hier oben ist atemberaubend.
examples.english: The view from up here is breathtaking.

examples.german: Wir haben einen schönen Ausblick auf den See.
examples.english: We have a beautiful view of the lake.

examples.german: Der Ausblick auf die Zukunft ist ungewiss.
examples.english: The outlook for the future is uncertain.

examples.german: Von meinem Büro aus habe ich einen tollen Ausblick auf die Stadt.
examples.english: From my office, I have a great view of the city.

examples.german: Der Ausblick von der Terrasse ist einfach fantastisch.
examples.english: The view from the terrace is simply fantastic.
